name: Defy, Survive
description:
You're trapped in a small room with filled with spikes and saw blades. There's no escaping--but you can move, jump, and change the direction of gravity to help you survive as long as possible.

Spikes will come out of the wall and then retract. Saw blades will shoot in a straight line, and are not affected by gravity.

Controls:

  • WASD -- move, jump (by pressing key in opposite direction of current gravity)
  • Space -- also jump
  • IJKL or Arrow keys -- switch gravity direction
  • M to mute or unmute audio

Made by me in GameMaker Studio for LOWREZJAM2019.

The font used is Little Conquest by Jack Oatley, found here: https://jackoatley.itch.io/ikkle-font-pack. Thanks, Jack!
